review: I haven't had much time to mess around with it, but I have to say, the times I have, have really impressed me. I also have a roku, and don't get me wrong, I absolutely adore my roku, but this has free games on it and you can get a game controller for some as well. It has some apps that my tiny doesn't , and I just really like this.

review: I absolutely LOVE the Fire TV Stick!  I still have a Roku box in the living room, but the Fire TV Stick is more reliable, has less interruptions even during a bad storm, and I prefer the layout.  I highly recommend to anyone looking for their first or a new streaming device!
